mapper.select: select nid,ntitle, ncontent ,to_char(ndate,'yyyy.mm.dd') ndate, nhits, nfile, nsfile, nfile_t, nsfile_t from TESTNOTICE where nid=#{nid}
mapper.update: update TESTNOTICE set ntitle=#{ntitle}, ncontent=#{ncontent}, nfile=#{nfile}, nsfile=#{nsfile}, nfile_t=#{nfile_t}, nsfile_t=#{nsfile_t}, ndate=#{ndate}, nhits=0, where nid=#{nid}
